New Records: Jamal Murray shot 4-for-6 from the 3-point line
Russell Westbrook scored 11 of his 19 points in the third quarter
Key Match Events: The Nuggets had six players in double figures
Russell Westbrook broke out a rock-the-baby celebration for the fans after an and-one against Norman Powell
Julian Strawther took heat-check 3s off the bench
Westbrook tipped in a Jordan missed free throws for a four-point possession
Pre-Game Insights: Coach Michael Malone reminisced about the Nuggets' win over the Clippers last season without Nikola Jokic
Malone emphasized the importance of not losing two games in a row
The Nuggets were down 1-2 against the Clippers head-to-head
Post-Match Reflections: Malone praised the team's performance and the way they found a way to win
Malone noted that the game had a lot of impact on the standings
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Clippers' James Harden was held to 16 points on 15 shots
The Nuggets' DeAndre Jordan had an outstanding performance with 12 points and 9 rebounds
Others: The Nuggets remain 8-0 on the second night of back-to-backs
The NBA un-clinched the hypothetical tiebreaker between the Nuggets and Clippers
